title: Tales of the Unexpected: How Italy’s Tour Champions Overcame the Odds
content:
In this second “Tales of the Unexpected,” John Wilcockson tells the startling stories of Italy’s Tour de France winners, including the three being honored at this year’s opening stages.

Read the full article at Tales of the Unexpected: How Italy’s Tour Champions Overcame the Odds  on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
